alert.note: Alert for Blue Earth (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 11:59PM CDT until August 11 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Blue Earth County in south central Minnesota... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1159 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Good Thunder, or 13 miles southwest of Mankato, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Mapleton around 1215 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include St. Clair and Pemberton. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
